column4: its just slow, id put it slightly better than Firefox. go with chromium
chromium is fine on small monitors , just don't try it on a large monitor from 10ft/3M away...the fonts on the tabs are too small to read for starters
you can adjust that

because hes asking if theres a safari counterpart for ubuntu. Hes not asking whats a good browser to use on a huge monitor from a distance

hey can still pastebin it
